Note: Item numerical values (armor, attack, etc.) in recipe images may not be up to date. This item can only be crafted. Station (1) - appears 4.5 minutes into the game...
data.text:
Details Category Weapon (thrown) Rarity Purple/Epic Quality 46 Damage Quantity 60

Item Info

The lightning bolt used by Hephaestus, the son of Zeus. He offered this to win the hand of Aphrodite, the Goddess of Beauty.

Made From

Astrape

Pilum

Javelin

Spear HandleThrowing Dagger

Short Spear

Volticletto

Awl

NailScrap Metal

Electronic Parts

WireBattery

Note: Item numerical values (armor, attack, etc.) in recipe images may not be up to date.

Found At

Lumia Island (Classic Mode)

This item can only be crafted.

Seoul Map (Team Match)

Station (1) - appears 4.5 minutes into the game

Needed to Craft

This item is not an ingredient for any other item.
